onboarding_description:
You can start receiving notifications days in advance. Remember important days in advance and prepare in time.

(Birthdays, Vehicle inspection, Valentine's day...)
onboarding2_description: Create your reminders on the dates you want! Don't forget anything by planning important days in advance.
onboarding3_title: Be ready in time for special occasions !
onboarding3_description: Get reminders so you never forget special occasions. Be prepared in advance for birthdays, anniversaries, and important events!

faq_q_0: What types of reminders can the app create?
faq_a_0: You can create reminders in different groups, such as birthdays, vehicle inspections, water drink reminders, special days.
faq_q_1: How do I turn reminder notifications on or off?
faq_a_1: You can edit and delete each reminder by swiping left. You can also temporarily turn it off or re-enable it if you want.
faq_a_2: You can group reminders into different groups, such as birthdays, vehicle inspections, and easily manage notifications within these groups.
faq_q_3: How many days in advance can you receive notifications?
faq_a_3: You can set your reminder notifications a few days before the event date to receive advance warnings.
faq_a_4: Yes, you can repeat your reminders hourly, daily, weekly, monthly or annually.
faq_q_5: Can I edit reminders I create later?
faq_a_5: Of course, you can update the title, date, recurrence period, and other details of existing notifications at any time.
faq_q_6: Do reminder notifications work even when the app is closed?
faq_a_6: Yes, notifications are sent to your device by us, so as long as you don't delete or log out of the app, it should work fine.
faq_q_7: How to add reminders for special days?
faq_a_7: You can create groups that include special days, such as Valentine's Day or anniversaries, and set custom notifications for those days.
faq_q_8: What does deleting unnecessary reminder notifications do?
faq_a_8: If you want, you can easily delete your reminder notifications or groups, so you can get rid of unnecessary notifications.
about_us_desc: Never miss a thing with Reminder Notifications! Keep track of your daily tasks, special dates, and important notes. With its easy-to-use interface and fast notification system, it's always by your side. You manage the time, we'll handle the reminders!
